site_name: St Philip And St James Vicarage
description: T1b - Lime (Tilia x europa)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m to alleviate stress on old pollard heads. Ensure crown is lifted to 5.5m over road and 2.5m over pathway. Remove basal and trunkal suckers up to crown break. Remove major deadwood.T1c - Lime (Tilia x europa)	Crown Lift to provide 5.5m clearance over the road. Remove basal and trunkal suckers up to crown break.T2 - Holly (Ilex aquifolium)	Crown lift to give approximately 0.5m clearance from the building.T11 - Ivy covered Holly (Ilex aquifolium)	Sever Ivy at height of hedge removing a 1ft section and leave Ivy to die off and fall out of the tree naturally. Trim all round by approximately 0.5-1m to tidy and shape.T12 - Lime (Tilia x europa)	30% Crown Reduction - Reducing the height and spread of the tree by approximately 2m back to most recent previous reduction points to alleviate stress on old pollard heads. Remove major deadwood throughout the crown and remove large dead section of the tree. 	T13 - Holly (Ilex aquifolium)	Sever Ivy at height of hedge removing a 1ft section and leave Ivy to die off and fall out of the tree naturally. Crown lift to give 2.5m clearance over pathway.	T14 - Holly (Ilex aquifolium)	Sever Ivy at height of hedge removing a 1ft section and leave Ivy to die off and fall out of the tree naturally. Crown lift to give 2.5m clearance over pathway.T15 - Portuguese Laurel (Prunus lusitanica)	Remove decaying limb, see pictures for guidance.T19,20 - Holly (Ilex aquifolium) X2 Ivy clad	Crown Lift to provide 2.5m clearance over the pathway. Trim lower sections and section through gateway to maintain nice arch shape.
